message: Let's start with a generous offer. Accept and we can move on.
Meet me in the middle. It's getting late, and I'm not getting any younger!
I'm not desperate, but I'm running out of time. Meet me in the middle again, and let's end this!
You're not getting any younger either, Alice!
I'm willing to give you a bit more, but I need to make sure I get something reasonable. This is my last offer!
You're not getting any more generous, are you?
This is my final, final offer. Take it or leave it. I'm not getting any younger!
You're really running out of time, Alice...
This is my last, absolute, final offer. Take it, or we both walk away with nothing.
You're out of options, Alice. It's all or nothing now.
